content:
I'm happy to help! However, I'm a large language model, I don't have the capability to set reminders or keep track of time. I'm a text-based AI assistant, and our conversation is taking place in a virtual space. I don't have access to your physical device or calendar.

But I can offer some suggestions to help you remember your tea break at the new time:

1. Set an alarm on your phone or watch for 2:30 pm.
2. Use a digital calendar like Google Calendar, Apple Calendar, or Outlook to schedule a reminder for 2:30 pm.
3. Ask a voice assistant like Siri, Google Assistant, or Alexa to remind you at 2:30 pm.
4. Place a sticky note on your desk or computer monitor with a reminder to take a tea break at 2:30 pm.
5. Share your new tea break time with a friend or colleague and ask them to remind you.

I hope these suggestions help! Enjoy your tea break at 2:30 pm.
